item.title: Run jupyter notebook online with AWS EC2
item.description: Source https://medium.com/@alexjsanchez/python-3-notebooks-on-aws-ec2-in-15-mostly-easy-steps-2ec5e662c6c6 Requirement A AWS EC2’s instance Setup EC2 Create EC2 instance Choose AMI Choose the instance’s type Setup network You’ll need to place this instance in to public subnet and assign to it a public IP. Create key or use existed key for ssh Setup ssh key (optional) At local environment 1 $ vi ~/.ssh/config Add this to end of file 1 2 3 4 5 Host jupyter Hostname {ec2's public IP above} IdentityFile {above downloaded key} Port 22 User ec2-user Test access
